a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Annual per capita consumption of books, 1475 to 1775
A book is defined as a published title with more than 49 pages.
Data source: Buringh and Van Zanden (2009)
Note: Observations are plotted at the midpoint of the 50-year-period they refer to.
